body: I'm missing the "author" and "contributors" :(

I would prefer two additional settings:
- `"arrowParens": "always"` (much better readability)
- `"printWidth": 100` (works well with github GUI side by side comparison)

My configuration for my own projects looks like this:
```json
{
	"arrowParens": "always",
	"bracketSpacing": true,
	"printWidth": 120,
	"semi": true,
	"singleQuote": true,
	"tabWidth": 4,
	"trailingComma": "none",
	"useTabs": true
}
```

Feel free to select some of these settings
Yes, we'll be adding more elements in the next patch.

```js
function assign(target) {
```
or
```js
var assign = function(target) {
```
